original_text: Give an offering by fire as a smell to make the Lord happy. Give a burnt offering of one bull, one male sheep and seven male lambs that are a year old. The animals must not have anything wrong with them.
korean_text: 번제로 여호와께 향기로운 화제를 드리되 수송아지 한 마리와 숫양 한 마리와 일 년 되고 흠 없는 숫양 일곱 마리를 드릴 것이며

sentences.original_text: as a smell to make the Lord happy
Give a burnt offering of one bull
and seven male lambs that are a year old
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 일년 된 수양 일곱 마리

sentences.original_text: The animals must not have anything wrong with them
sentences.korean_translation: 그 동물들은 아무런 흠이 없어야 한다
